verses.verse: God, <WH430> don't <WH1824> keep silent. Don't <WH1824> keep silent, and don't <WH8252> be still, God. <WH410>
For, <WH341> behold, your enemies are stirred <WH1993> up. <WH8130> Those who hate you have lifted up <WH5375> their heads. <WH7218>
They conspire <WH5475> with cunning <WH6191> against your people. <WH5971> They plot <WH3289> against your cherished ones. <WH6845>
"Come, <WH3212>" they say, <WH559> "and let <WH3582>'s destroy them as a nation, <WH1471> that the name <WH8034> of Israel <WH3478> may be remembered no more. <WH2142>"
For they have conspired <WH3289> together <WH3162> with one mind. <WH3820> They form <WH3772> an alliance against you. <WH1285>
The tents <WH168> of Edom <WH123> and the Ishmaelites; <WH3459> Moab, <WH4124> and the Hagrites; <WH1905>
Gebal, <WH1381> Ammon, <WH5983> and Amalek; <WH6002> Philistia <WH6429> with the inhabitants <WH3427> of Tyre; <WH6865>
Assyria <WH804> also is joined <WH3867> with them. <WH2220> They have helped the children <WH1121> of Lot. <WH3876> Selah. <WH5542>
Do <WH6213> to them as you did to Midian, <WH4080> as to Sisera, <WH5516> as to Jabin, <WH2985> at the river <WH5158> Kishon; <WH7028>
who perished <WH8045> at Endor, <WH5874> who became as dung <WH1828> for the earth. <WH127>
Make <WH7896> their nobles <WH5081> like Oreb <WH6159> and Zeeb; <WH2062> yes, <WH5257> all their princes like Zebah <WH2078> and Zalmunna; <WH6759>
who said, <WH559> "Let us take possession <WH3423> of God <WH430>'s pasturelands. <WH4999>"
My God, <WH430> make <WH7896> them like tumbleweed; <WH1534> like chaff <WH7179> before <WH6440> the wind. <WH7307>
As the fire <WH784> that burns <WH1197> the forest, <WH3293> as the flame <WH3852> that sets <WH3857> the mountains <WH2022> on fire, <WH3857>
so pursue <WH7291> them with your tempest, <WH5591> and terrify <WH926> them with your storm. <WH5492>
Fill <WH4390> their faces <WH6440> with confusion, <WH7036> that they may seek <WH1245> your name, <WH8034> Yahweh. <WH3068>
Let them be disappointed <WH954> and dismayed <WH926> forever. <WH5703> Yes, <WH2659> let them be confounded and perish; <WH6>
that they may know <WH3045> that you alone, <WH8034> whose name is Yahweh, <WH3068> are the Most High <WH5945> over all the earth. <WH776>
